Curator's comments: Perhaps part of a decree, a rarity at Naukratis.
The piece was not found in excavations but brought to Hogarth by locals; he dates it to the third century BC.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (no. 44)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (BA.12)
